experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: SquareMeals aimed to provide meaningful employment to orphaned youths and means of a healthy lifestyle to construction workers. This is to achieve our larger goal of supporting the socioeconomic integration of orphans as well as improving the productivity of daily labourers.Status: InactiveReason: Capital intensive, too many stakeholders, lacks network effect and not scalable.

experience.title: Data analyst intern
experience.description: 1.  Developed a time series based price prediction model using achieving accuracy of 90.6% 2.  Incorporated ARIMA model in daily price prediction of crop prices in multiple markets3.  Real Time Analysis of Tenali village to check the accuracy and feasibility of my model 4.   Cross Validated rolling mean/ random forest imputation for gap filling by performing various       mathematical operations to obtain the final structure of a time series data  5.   Explored Neural Networks, LSTM and ARIMAX to create a dynamic prediction model
experience.description_html: 1. Developed a time series based price prediction model using achieving accuracy of 90.6% 2. Incorporated ARIMA model in daily price prediction of crop prices in multiple markets3. Real Time Analysis of Tenali village to check the accuracy and feasibility of my model 4. Cross Validated rolling mean/ random forest imputation for gap filling by performing various  mathematical operations to obtain the final structure of a time series data 5. Explored Neural Networks, LSTM and ARIMAX to create a dynamic prediction model

recommendations: Aayush Gupta ‚ÄúI have worked with Avirup for just a month but we worked on planning and strategising almost an year‚Äôs work at FamPay. He was always on his toes to execute whatever it took to setup the right base for FamPay. All the best for your endeavour bhai!‚Äù

Dipramit Pal ‚ÄúVisionary: Has a vision, follows it with a smile. He ain't scared about failing since he knows he will figure a way to come out of it. Trust: Puts a lot of faith in his team and that kind of is itself a morale boost when your CEO shows that level of confidence in yourself. Leadership: Takes a decision follows it, evaluates it after some time, takes feedback from the team and modifies his tactics and redo. The fact GrowthMart has undergone so many changes in strategies and flow charts after going through multiple discussion with everyone in the team is itself a sign of a leader who is ready to listen and not just put his views on others. Understanding: He understanding and boosted my mood to the best of his ability. He understood that I needed space and lets me off meetings if required then, and hence kinda grateful.‚Äù

honors_and_awards.description: ‚Ä¢ Qualified among the top 1000 teams selected from more than 200,000 applicants globally ‚Ä¢ Developed a business plan for the skill development and employment of orphans to cater to the dietary needs of construction workers ‚Ä¢ The initiative aims to meet the United Nations SDGs of 1 (No Poverty), 2 (Zero Hunger), 3 (Good Health and Well-Being), 4 (Quality Education), 8 (Decent Work and Economic Growth) and 9 (Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure)
